001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.exceptions.DatabaseOperationException;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.log.LogDb;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query.QueryResponse;
008import java.sql.Connection;
009import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
010import java.sql.ResultSet;
011import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;
012import java.sql.SQLException;
013import java.sql.Statement;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.Collections;
016import java.util.HashMap;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Map;
019
020/**
021 * Implements a database client for executing SQL queries on relational databases.
022 *
023 * <p>This class handles database interactions, including executing queries and processing
024 * results for both SELECT and UPDATE statements.
025 *
026 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
027 */
028public class RelationalDbClient implements DbClient {
029
030   private final BaseDbConnectorService connector;
031   private final DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig;
032
033   /**
034    * Constructs a new {@code RelationalDbClient} with the specified connector and configuration.
035    *
036    * @param connector The database connection service.
037    * @param dbConfig  The database configuration details.
038    */
039   public RelationalDbClient(BaseDbConnectorService connector, DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
040      this.connector = connector;
041      this.dbConfig = dbConfig;
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Executes a SQL query and processes the result.
046    *
047    * @param query The SQL query to execute.
048    * @return The {@code QueryResponse} containing the query results.
049    * @throws DatabaseOperationException If the query execution fails.
050    */
051   @Override
052   public QueryResponse executeQuery(String query) {
053      try {
054         Connection connection = connector.getConnection(dbConfig);
055         LogDb.info("Obtained database connection for: {}", dbConfig.getDatabase());
056         return executeAndProcessQuery(connection, query);
057      } catch (SQLException e) {
058         throw new DatabaseOperationException("Error executing query: " + query, e);
059      }
060   }
061
062   private QueryResponse executeAndProcessQuery(Connection connection, String query) throws SQLException {
063      printQuery(query);
064      long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
065
066      if (query.trim().toLowerCase().startsWith("select")) {
067         return executeSelectQuery(connection, query, startTime);
068      } else {
069         return executeUpdateQuery(connection, query, startTime);
070      }
071   }
072
073   private QueryResponse executeSelectQuery(Connection connection, String query, long startTime) throws SQLException {
074      List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = new ArrayList<>();
075
076      try (PreparedStatement preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(query);
077           ResultSet resultSet = preparedStatement.executeQuery()) {
078
079         ResultSetMetaData metaData = resultSet.getMetaData();
080         int columnCount = metaData.getColumnCount();
081
082         while (resultSet.next()) {
083            Map<String, Object> row = new HashMap<>();
084            for (int i = 1; i <= columnCount; i++) {
085               row.put(metaData.getColumnName(i), resultSet.getObject(i));
086            }
087            resultList.add(row);
088         }
089      }
090
091      long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
092      QueryResponse response = new QueryResponse(resultList);
093      printResponse(query, response, duration);
094
095      if (duration > 1000) {
096         LogDb.warn("Slow query detected: '{}' took {}ms", query, duration);
097      }
098
099      return response;
100   }
101
102   private QueryResponse executeUpdateQuery(Connection connection, String query, long startTime) throws SQLException {
103      List<Map<String, Object>> resultList = Collections.singletonList(
104            Collections.singletonMap("updatedRows", executeUpdate(connection, query))
105      );
106
107      long duration = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
108      QueryResponse response = new QueryResponse(resultList);
109
110      if (duration > 1000) {
111         LogDb.warn("Slow update query detected: '{}' took {}ms", query, duration);
112      }
113
114      return response;
115   }
116
117   private int executeUpdate(Connection connection, String query) throws SQLException {
118      try (Statement statement = connection.createStatement()) {
119         return statement.executeUpdate(query);
120      }
121   }
122
123   /**
124    * Logs the executed query.
125    *
126    * @param query The SQL query being executed.
127    */
128   protected void printQuery(String query) {
129      LogDb.step("Executing database query: {}", query);
130   }
131
132   /**
133    * Logs the query response details.
134    *
135    * @param query    The executed SQL query.
136    * @param response The query response containing results.
137    * @param duration The execution duration in milliseconds.
138    */
139   protected void printResponse(String query, QueryResponse response, long duration) {
140      LogDb.step("Query '{}' executed in {}ms, result count: {}", query, duration, response.getRows().size());
141      LogDb.extended("Query response data: {}", response.getRows());
142   }
143
144}
